scenario_text.value:
See, just like I said! I protected you—and
all by my lonesome.

I don’t tell lies, Aoi. So go on, believe in
what I say.
Yeah. Yes, that’s really true, isn’t it?

You always speak so kindly to me, and you fit
me so well.

I wasn’t sure if I could really trust in
that.

The truth is, the one I couldn’t trust was
myself.
I want to treat myself the way you treat me.
I hope you stick by my side, Labramon.
